spec_data.Name: bharati-m17n
spec_data.Description:
bharati is an enhancement to input method based on InScript layout and
implements unique transformation rule of deleting on the fly the previous
dependent vowel for Indic languages.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:43:46 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Bharati input method based on InScript layout
